    Utility methods related to processing asynchronous web requests.

        public static WebAsyncManager getAsyncManager(javax.servlet.ServletRequest servletRequest)

      • getAsyncManager

      • createAsyncWebRequest

        public static AsyncWebRequest createAsyncWebRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Create an AsyncWebRequest instance. By default, an instance of StandardServletAsyncWebRequest gets created.
        参数:
        request - the current request
        response - the current response
        返回:
        an AsyncWebRequest instance (never null)
